actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a taxpayer who does not itemize his deductions to deduct amounts paid as State and local income taxes from gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit a taxpayer who does not itemize his deductions to deduct from gross income amounts paid as State and local income taxes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a taxpayer who does not itemize his deductions to deduct amounts paid as State and local income taxes from gross income.
